definition: of or pertaining to China or its peoples or cultures, the Chinese language
details:
adjective
- of or pertaining to China or its peoples or cultures
= example: of or pertaining to China or its peoples or cultures
- of or relating to or characteristic of the island republic on Taiwan or its residents or their language
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of the island republic on Taiwan or its residents or their language
= synonyms: Taiwanese, Formosan
noun
- the Chinese language
= example: the Chinese language
- collectively, the people of China
= example: collectively, the people of China
